Reference

Finding media

Searching for items is usually required to retrieve some kind of ID, like the slug, which is required for use of item-specific functions.

trakt.search() trakt.search.byid()

Search for a show via text query or id

Shows & movies that are popular, trending, anticipated, ...

trakt.popular() trakt.trending() trakt.anticipated() trakt.played() trakt.watched() trakt.collected() trakt.updates()

See which movies / shows are popular

Simple summary data

trakt.movies.summary() trakt.shows.summary()

Get show or movie summary info

trakt.people.summary()

Get a single person's details

Season and episode data

trakt.seasons.summary()

Get a show's seasons

trakt.seasons.season()

Get a season of a show

Movie-specific data

trakt.movies.releases()

Get a movie's release details

trakt.movies.boxoffice()

Get the weekend box office

Media ratings

trakt.shows.ratings() trakt.movies.ratings() trakt.seasons.ratings() trakt.episodes.ratings()

Show or movie user ratings

Media stats

trakt.shows.stats() trakt.movies.stats() trakt.seasons.stats() trakt.episodes.stats()

Get a show or movie's stats

Related media

trakt.movies.related() trakt.shows.related()

Search for related shows or movies

User-specific data

trakt.user.collection()

Get a user's collected shows or movies

trakt.user.history()

Get a user's watch history

trakt.user.network()

Get a user's social connections

trakt.user.ratings()

Get a user's ratings

trakt.user.stats()

Get a user's stats

trakt.user.watched()

Get a user's watched shows or movies

trakt.user.watchlist()

Get a user's watchlist

Data relating to people

trakt.shows.people() trakt.movies.people()

Get the cast and crew of a show or movie

trakt.people.movies() trakt.people.shows()

Get a single person's movie or show credits

trakt.people.summary()

Get a single person's details

API interaction and reference topics

build_trakt_url()

Assemble a trakt.tv API URL

trakt_get()

Make an API call and receive parsed output

trakt_credentials()

Set the required trakt.tv API credentials

trakt_api_common_parameters

Common API parameters

search_filters

Result Filters

Episode datasets

futurama

Futurama episodes

gameofthrones

Game of Thrones episodes

Internal datasets

These are unlikely to be useful on their own, but they are useful as a reference for optional filters.

countries

Country codes

genres

Genres

languages

Language codes

networks

Available networks

certifications

Certifications

This package

tRakt-package

tRakt: Get Data from 'trakt.tv'
